short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use OpenAI's GPT-3.5-Turbo to generate text, translate languages, and write code on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**New Features**
-It now works on Outlook, Gmail & Hubspot CRM

Unleash the future of browsing with GenieeAI, the ultimate Chrome extension that redefines how you engage with the web. Imagine a genie that grants your every text-related wish – that's Geniee AI. ✨ Elevate your productivity with lightning-fast text generation powered by ChatGPT technology.

We all are tired of juggling multiple tabs and hunting for the ChatGPT tab when crafting LinkedIn posts, reaching out to recruiters, or connecting with potential sales leads?

Say goodbye to that hassle and hello to efficiency with GenieeAI! 🌟With GenieeAI just type /Genie Your Prompt & a semicolon, and watch your text come to life—no more tab-hopping required!

🧞✨Here's why GenieeAI is a game-changer:

📝 Works seamlessly for LinkedIn post creation, Crafting emails on Gmail, Tweets on Twitter, posts on Reddit & other popular websites.
💬 Streamlines LinkedIn chats and replies.
🗨️ Smoothly handles LinkedIn comments and comment replies.
🔍 Takes on the challenge of Sales Navigator (Linkedin Premium) effortlessly.

Don't just take my word for it—see GenieeAI in action in the below Video and experience the transformation for yourself. Say hello to efficiency, and wave goodbye to tab overload!
